data.title: Cold and soggy food
data.text: Terrible food and rude, disrespectful service. Will never attempt eating at this place again. Twice we have had nearly identical service and food, if you want to call it that. Bypass this place and go up the street to the sports bar restaurant on the north side of the bypass past the holiday station. Great food and excellent pricing and service. If you want to be abused by a bunch of mouthy kids. By all means stop at this burger king.

data.title: whopper jr or bust
data.text: Sometimes ya just gotta have that flame broiled taste. In this case that whopper junior with everything but tomatoes hits the spot sometimes. What I didn't appreciate was some old guy almost getting into it with some young guy near where I was standing in line. That's what happens when there are too many damned casino's in a row near the fast food places in town and people can't hold their booze. Definitely not up-scale clientele that's for sure. This will likely cause me to frequent this location a lot less in the future.

data.title: Not good
data.text: There's not much to say other than it was one of the worst fast foods I have gone to. Waiting for food took forever, the people working there were unfriendly, and after waiting forever to get food or was cold. Won't be going back.

data.title: General  Manager Needs People Skills and More Training
data.text:
I normally do not review fast food resturants, today i had to. A friend and I decided to have breakfast at Burger King this morning (3/18/15). I could tell something was up the way we were greeted by the front counter person. She was not happy and there was a bit of tension in the air.
My friend and I thought it was because of the early hour not everyone is a morning person.
Our food took longer than normal to come up perhaps 10-15 minutes. I might add we were the only ones in the resturant at the time and no one was in the drive thru.
Finally our order came up the front counter person was aopolgetic on the length of time it took., Still noted tension in her voice and felt it around that space.
My friend and I were about halfway through our breakfast enjoying nice conversation when all of a sudden the general  manager began YELLING AND BERATING an emplyee who had just reported to work.
You could hear this woman yelling and scraming through out the lobby area her voice was echoing off the walls. She was berating him for being late, how she had to sweep the outside of the building, how she had to do all the cooking, how she had to do everything because he was 20 minutes late.
This yelling and berating continued for the rest of our meal.. I left the table walked to the counter and let her know she was being rude,that  she needed to do her "counseling" in the back office not in the front where every one can hear her. Of course she said she was joking with the employee, I said that was not joking your tone was not jovial nor was it pleasant. I asked for the phone number to the cooperarte office she would not give it to mme. I said fine I will just call the police and let them sort it out, you were verbally attacking the employee and being disruptive to your customers, i am sure a disorderlly conduct arrest would be in order. She would not give me the number to she dialed it herself. In the mean time the employee was trying to cover for her she put him up to it thry were in the back whispering when she was dialing cooperate for me. He said it was all a joke i said no it was not she needs to learn people skills and how to handle situations like this.
I finally was able to speak to Kim in cooperate in Billings, MT I let her know what exactly transpired and how disruptive it was to us as customers and how unprofessional it was of her to do this to anyone in public. Kim agreed with me and said she would handle it. i suggested termination on the spot.  
By the time we left her story had changed to how he went from being an employee to now being her boyfriend. I did not belive her nor did my friend believe her. 
I will not darken any Burger King doorway in Great Falls again...I am sure if this General manager is this way then there are other problems in other stores as well. Cooperate needs to get a handle on this before someone does call the police or it gets out of hand by someone saying the wrong thing then it just escelates out of control.
This was the Northwest Bypass locaton in Great Falls MT.

data.title: Alwynbilly comfort food reviews
data.text: Burger King features a great value menu, and most places have the biggest selection of no or low calorie drinks I have seen.  This puts it in the top 5 for the frugal unfussy choice for good eats.

data.title: Lunch at Burger King
data.text: We had lunch today in the Burger King at Malmstrom Air Force Base and it was very good.  The restaurant was clean and the service was quick.  Four of us ate there.

data.title: Fantastic selection of drinks.
data.text: The food was good. The self serve drink selection was different from anything else that I had ever seen. Coca Cola machine had all the normal flavors and had the ability to add different flavor combinations to each drink. As well there were flavors that are not even available in stores. An example is Mellow Yellow Zero. I would return here just to have a pop.

data.title: IN A HURRY FOR A QUICK BITE, STOP HERE
data.text: Quick fast service! Reasonable priced for a fast food place! You know what you are getting as it is a national chain and they do take coupons! Sometimes when traveling we prefer the chain-places so we do not get any unknown food that could make us ill while we are traveling!

data.title: I Enjoyed It
data.text: The service was fast and the food was good. I enjoyed the high tech drink machine the most. I'd come here again.

data.title: unsanitary....
data.text: the place is disgusting, its sooo unsanitary, the bathrooms need immediate sanitary attention, and obviously, the supervisors need to learn how to properly train their employees about the importance of health sanitation. seen that some of the employees dont even wear gloves. gross? yuck!

data.title: Bk visit
data.text:
I'm at the westside BK I love this place I also go to the westside McDonalds this BK is so much better and it's all about the service 
The people at BK are so much nicer and really friendly and the best and most friendly is Becky she is always happy always in a good mood she's the main reason my family goes to Burger King
